371870.name: Act 3 Soundtrack
371870.description:
Immerse yourself in the sounds of swamp noir with this specially packaged EP for Act 3: Boomtown. Composed by Chris Wilson and Steve Pardo of SkewSound, the original soundtrack embodies the uncertainty and secrets awaiting to be revealed through game's three acts. This 7-track EP gives you the full musical experience:
  • Hard Heart Heavy Hand (Bellet 3)
  • Up From the Deep (Romana 3)
  • Preparations (Gallant and Woodstep)
  • Radio Song 3
  • Last Drawl
  • Cut Her Down
  • Knee Deep (Alternate Theme)
371870.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
